name: Binary search
remark: Binary search your input number in range 1 to 99

name: Compute Fib(n) with naive recursion O(2^n)
Compute Fib(n) with iteration O(n)
remark: You have lost interest in this

name: Compute Fib(n) with tricky recursion O(logn)
Permutation
remark: Enter a non-negative integer and we will prints all permutations of {1,...,n}, each of which is separated by 11111111

name: Random number generator
remark: Enter a seed and the number of random numbers to generate. This VM's support of global vars makes it possible to implement LCG, which serves as the basis of many examples below.

name: Number guessing game
remark: Enter a seed and keep guessing the number generated in [0,32768). You will see -1 if your guess is smaller, 1 if larger.

name: Quick sort
remark: Enter a seed and see quick sort result on 30 random numbers

name: Heap sort
remark: Enter a seed and see heap sort result on 30 random numbers

name: Insert sort
remark: Enter a seed and see insert sort result on 30 random numbers

name: Merge sort
remark: Enter a seed and see merge sort result on 30 random numbers

name: Stack overflow attack
remark: Is stack overflow attack also possible here?

name: Benchmark
remark: Keep the VM busy and do benchmark
